about_the_game:
Yomi World Accelerator is dedicated to providing players with high-quality game acceleration services.

New users can enjoy 3 days of SVIP time by registering, and invite friends to register to get 5 days of additional SVIP time.

All game platform login, national service game acceleration is free, and at the same time, some of the hot games and new games are exempted from acceleration for an indefinite period of time.

Support PC, host and mobile game acceleration.

The gaming-level dedicated line, exclusive “Dupath dual-channel” ultra-stable technology, and “first-hop” weak-network enhancement technology create the ultimate acceleration experience.

For more information, please visit Yomi World Accelerator website.

Currently supported game server regions:

Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Korea, North America, Singapore, Russia, Europe, Australia, Southeast Asia, etc.

Currently supported games:

PUBG, League of Legends, CS2, Apex Heroes, Roblox, GTA5, and more than 2000 games.

Currently owned features:

PC game acceleration, console game acceleration, mobile game acceleration, Dupath dual-channel acceleration, virtual LAN connection, network repair, various game gadgets and so on.

Welcome to feedback and communication through various channels:

You can contact us through QQ group, B site, Shake, email, etc. to build a better gas pedal together!

Translated with (free version)
detailed_description:
Yomi World Accelerator is dedicated to providing players with high-quality game acceleration services.

New users can enjoy 3 days of SVIP time by registering, and invite friends to register to get 5 days of additional SVIP time.

All game platform login, national service game acceleration is free, and at the same time, some of the hot games and new games are exempted from acceleration for an indefinite period of time.

Support PC, host and mobile game acceleration.

The gaming-level dedicated line, exclusive “Dupath dual-channel” ultra-stable technology, and “first-hop” weak-network enhancement technology create the ultimate acceleration experience.

For more information, please visit Yomi World Accelerator website.

name: Yomi世界加速器

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphique
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

short_description: Yomi World Accelerator is now available on Steam! It supports free Steam acceleration, one-click launch and acceleration of thousands of popular games. The unique “Dupath dual-channel” ultra-stable technology. Supports virtual LAN connectivity, Friends in other countries can play online games.
